Posted on February 19, 2011

Generating a Database Data Dictionary

Posted on February 12, 2011

Accurate documentation is paramount for any system. Unfotunately, when developing a database we sometimes tend to overlook this particular document. A data dictionary shows metadata about your database. This information can be generated from the DBMS itself using the INFORMATION_SCHEMA compatibility views.
